appStore.subtitle: Educational Mining Simulation
appStore.description:
Learn about cryptocurrency mining through Pall Network's educational simulation platform.

Key Features:
• Educational mining simulation with 24-hour cycles
• Learn about referral systems and network effects
• Practice with Web3 wallet integration
• Progressive Web App technology
• Safe learning environment with virtual rewards

Pall Network is designed for educational purposes to teach users about cryptocurrency concepts, blockchain technology, and mining economics through gamification. All activities are simulated and designed for learning.

No real cryptocurrency mining occurs - this is an educational simulation platform.

Privacy Policy: https://pallnetworkcommerce.com/policies
Terms of Service: https://pallnetworkcommerce.com/policies
